                int cost,

                int stone,
                int wood,
                int knowledge,
                int tiles)
        Constructor of Building object
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the card
        name - the name of the card
        cost - the amount won at the end of the construction of the building
        point - the number of points won at the end of the constrcution of the building
        stone - the number of stone for the construction of the building
        wood - the number of wood for the construction of the building
        knowledge - the number of knowledge for the construction of the building
        tiles - the number of tile for the construction of the building
